recipesJson.name: Sweet And Smokey Strawberry
recipesJson.author: JOE_ROOTS
recipesJson.description:
A super delicious  combination of Smokey tobacco with hint of honey 🍯 and caramel and a bright ripe strawberry 🍓. The cheesecake graham crust adds a little cream and giving the mix some mouthfeel and a touch of graham cracker which goes so well with both the ry4 double and the tobacco. The AP is there to boost that crack. 

Enjoy this little beauty after a 5-7 day steep 🤤🍓🙂🍯
